structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXIII. MIAMI-DADE HOUSING CIVIL RIGHTS OVERSIGHT BOARD

law.catch_line: Applicability of Federal, State and County Laws.

text.section:
Sec. 2-2057. Applicability of Federal, State and County Laws.
The Oversight Board shall be subject to and governed by: Chapter 286 of Florida Statutes, ("Sunshine Law"); Chapter 119 of Florida Statutes ("Public Records Act"); Chapter 112, Part III of Florida Statutes ("Code of Ethics for Public Officers and Employees"); of Miami-Dade County Code ("Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance"); Article IB of Miami-Dade County Code ("Standards for Creation and Review of Boards Generally") and the Home Rule Charter.
